inclusion.criterion: suspected with prostate cancer and planned to undergo prostate needle biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with serum PSA test result
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with late-stage uremia and need regular dialysis

notes: The patient is a 55 year old man visiting his primary care physician for lower urinary tract symptoms. He has an IPSS score of 15, prostate volume of 60 mL, PSA level of 3.2 ng/mL and maximum flow rate of 10 mL/sec.
